document.full_text: actor mel gibson slipped into a los angeles police station late wednesday night to be fingerprinted and photographed following his no contest plea last week for domestic battery on his ex-girlfriend.
document.title: mel gibson booked by police on battery plea
lines_and_colors: actor mel gibson slipped into a los angeles police station late wednesday night to be fingerprinted and photographed following his no contest plea last week for domestic battery on his ex-girlfriend.
